#summary AWA Tutorial

= Introduction =

This tutorial describes all the steps to setup, design and implement
a web application using the AWA framework.  The tutorial is split
in several parts that focus on a specific step in the setup and design
of a web application.

= Setting up the project =

The first part [http://blog.vacs.fr/vacs/blogs/post.html?post=2014/05/08/Ada-Web-Application-Setting-up-the-project Setting up the project] explains how to setup a new project.

= Building the UML model =

The [http://blog.vacs.fr/vacs/blogs/post.html?post=2014/05/18/Ada-Web-Application--Building-the-UML-model Building the UML model] part describes
how to design a UML model for the web application in order to modelize
the database tables and get some code generated automatically.
